---
title: "Metadata Requirements"
---

Certain metadata fields are required for Project and Product metadata. 

### Basic Information    

| Metadata Field                | Project Items   | Product Items   |
|:------------------------------|:-------------|:-------------|
| Title                        | [**Required**](project_records/main_tab_project.qmd#title)^\*^                           | [**Required**](product_records/main_tab_product.qmd#title)^\*^                         |
| Status                       | [**Required**](project_records/main_tab_project.qmd#status)^\*^                         | [**Required**](product_records/main_tab_product.qmd#status)^\*^                         |
| Resource Type                |                                                                                         | [**Required**](product_records/main_tab_product.qmd#resource-types)                     |
| Points of Contact            |                                                                                         |                                                                                         |
|        Point of Contact          | [**Required**](project_records/main_tab_project.qmd#point-of-contacts)                  | [**Required**](product_records/main_tab_product.qmd#point-of-contacts)                  |
|        Custodian                 | [**Required**](project_records/main_tab_project.qmd#point-of-contacts)                  | [**Required**](product_records/main_tab_product.qmd#point-of-contacts)                  |
|        Administrator             | [**Required**](project_records/main_tab_project.qmd#point-of-contacts)^\*^                |                                                                                       |
|        Administrative Region     | [**Required**](project_records/main_tab_project.qmd#point-of-contacts)                  | [**Required**](product_records/main_tab_product.qmd#point-of-contacts)                  |
|        Principal Investigator    | [**Required, if applicable**](project_records/main_tab_project.qmd#point-of-contacts)^\*^ | [**Required, if applicable**](product_records/main_tab_product.qmd#point-of-contacts)^\*^ |
|        Co-Principal Investigator | If applicable                                                                           | If applicable                                                                        |
| Abstract                     | [**Required**](project_records/main_tab_project.qmd#abstract)^\*^                         | [**Required**](product_records/main_tab_product.qmd#abstract)^\*^                    |
| Start Date                   | [**Required**](project_records/main_tab_project.qmd#time-period)^\*^                      | If applicable                                                                        |
| End Date                     | [**Required**](project_records/main_tab_project.qmd#time-period)^\*^                      | [**Required**](product_records/main_tab_product.qmd#time-period)^\*^                 |
: {.striped .hover .bordered .md .allborder} 

^\*^ Also required under the ScienceBase 30-day Policy    
<br/>

### Contact Information    
Certain metadata fields are required for Individual or Organization contacts.  

| Metadata Field                | Individual    | Organization    |
|:------------------------------|:-------------|:-------------|
| Type                | [**Required**](contact_records/individual_contacts.qmd#create-a-new-contact)     | [**Required**](contact_records/organization_contacts.qmd#create-a-new-contact)     |
| Individual Name     | [**Required**](contact_records/individual_contacts.qmd#create-a-new-contact)     |                                                                    |
| Organizational Name |                                                                  | [**Required**](contact_records/organization_contacts.qmd#create-a-new-contact)     |
| Position Name       | If applicable                                                    |                                                                    |
| Contact Type        | [**Required**](contact_records/individual_contacts.qmd#create-a-new-contact)     | [**Required**](contact_records/organization_contacts.qmd#create-a-new-contact)     |
| Member Organization | [**Required**](contact_records/individual_contacts.qmd#create-a-new-contact)     |                                                                    |
| Email Address       | [**Required**](contact_records/individual_contacts.qmd#create-a-new-contact)     | [**Required**](contact_records/organization_contacts.qmd#create-a-new-contact)     |
| Online Resource     |                                                                  | [**Required**](contact_records/organization_contacts.qmd#create-a-new-contact)     |
| Physical Address    | Best practice                                                    | Best practice                                                      |
| Logo                |                                                                  | Optional                                                           |
: {.striped .hover .bordered .md .allborder}
